title: Making wood inspection easier: FTIR spectroscopy and machine learning for Brazilian native commercial wood species identification
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7283-7289
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00174E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Everton Jesus, Thiago Franca, Camila Calvani, Miller Lacerda, Daniel Gonçalves, Samuel L. Oliveira, Bruno Marangoni, Cicero Cena
Sawdust molecular spectra are used as input data for the machine-learning algorithm to classify/identify different wood species.
